topics.body:
"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55260b69636872366de90100#post_55260b69636872366de90100
[bq="Meresflut"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55260afe636872360c940300#post_55260afe636872360c940300
Dostoievsky had a phrase for that:
"I tried to be a villain and I failed, I tried to be a hero, and I failed, then I realised only idiots can become something" Kind of makesyou think.[/bq]
When you get down to it the reason why so many people fail at achieving greatness is that people are too idealistic about how to "change the world".

The most effective way of looking at is "I don't want to be a hero" rather if you work at increasing the standard of living for people versus the cost and living and such you can improve countless lives while remaining profitable.

The most effective way of doing that would be to make your organization more effective and reduce money being wasted.

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552613f26368723834240100#post_552613f26368723834240100
:\
If there is a one-punch man game I doubt it would be a fighting game because a game where the protagonist can defeat all enemies with one punch would get all kinds of negative reviews for being too easy and chances are Yahtzee would probably rip into it like a piranha who smelt  blood on woman swimming in the amazon during that time of the month.

Puzzle game or point and click adventure *might* work though.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552618aa6368723775680900#post_552618aa6368723775680900
SNK bosses are unplayable characters that tend to be very unfair. (Like Geese or Rugal.)

And like I just added, A Tongue in cheek story mode could be possible. (It's a typical story mode thing until Saitama steps in, Where it ends after after one punch even on the hardest difficulty.)

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5526175d63687237927c0600#post_5526175d63687237927c0600
Problem with inserting Saitama into a fighting game: he would be a scripted unwinnable fight against that you can't progress any further beyond in the story once you meet him.  Essentially if he was the first boss then the rest of the game after him would never be seen because nobody would be able to win and thus never be able to finish the game.

If he was in a fighting game it would have to be DC and fighting superman cause superman is much like Saitama, except superman can fly.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
